info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:54PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN GREENE AND EAST CENTRAL MONTGOMERY COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Kettering, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Kettering, Beavercreek, Huber Heights, Fairborn, Bellbrook, Wright-Patterson Afb, Riverside, Centerville and Overlook-Page Mano. This includes I-70 in Ohio near mile marker 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
